title: Luther, Magi: Blood of Lynken II
description: Luther is eight-years-old and born into magic. Both his parents eat, sleep, and breathe magic. He makes a friend in Jason. Jason is a typical boy of Lynken, and it's the bow and blade for him.Luther's destiny is not the bow and blade. It's fire and brimstone, and magic strong enough to conquer armies.A new threat rises against Lynken. A kind of magic capable of controlling the strongest men. Controlling Luther. He is smitten and must obey. Juxta has to find a way to counter the magic and free his son, or kill him, whichever.Fantasy adventure as war rages in Lynken.
author: Geoffrey C. Porter
